PLN Directory

Hi {{firstName}},

Your information has been added to the PLN directory. You can view and edit your profile here.

  • Add your office hours link to your profile (e.g.,https://calendly.com/johnpln/15min-plnsync)
  • Join the PLN Discord (let me know your handle when you are done and I can tag you with the correct role)

Please reach out with any questions. We are happy to help!

Best regards,

PLN Team
